descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Create your own railroads, relax and go back to your childhood. Are you ready? Hop on board!                                                                                                                                       
[media]
Toy Trains is a playful track-building **puzzle game** with a nostalgic yet heartwarming storyline. Use your logic skills and imagination to construct trails and create your own small world. All that while enjoying **cozy and relaxing vibes**.
[media]
Rediscover building rails in a modern way. Each map has many possible solutions- you need to stay sharp, but can get as creative as you want!
[media]
There is something for everybody here. Relaxing main story. Devious challenges for those who like it tough. 
[media]
Sandbox board for people who love tinkering and expressing themselves.
 [media]


# In Toy Trains you can:

- **Be creative** - try various options to solve open-ended challenges

- **Express yourself**- decorate the land in your individual style

- **Play with the world itself** - splash some water, move the trees or have fun with little Railies!

- **Go back in time** - experience child-like joy and live through a nostalgic storyline

- **Build** - design your own dioramas on sandbox board.

- **Relax** - there is no rush and no stress in the Toy Trains land

- **Immerse** - feel all that and more in the most captivating way - VR!
